title: NEIL YOUNG DIGITAL FONT?
content:
Can anyone identify the blue digital caps from Neil Young's Rust Never Sleeps. Looks familiar? Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162128im_/http:/typophile.com/files/415KdycxxZL_4076._SL500_.jpg)
author: bblankst

comments.content:
The best place for a font identification is  
 [http://www.typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162128/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid "http://www.typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.

There are lots of fonts in this vein that simulate early computer output. Here are a few.  
 [http://fonts.simplythebest.net/fonts/checkbook.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162128/http:/fonts.simplythebest.net/fonts/checkbook.html "http://fonts.simplythebest.net/fonts/checkbook.html")  
 [http://fontm.com/hydrogen-whiskey-font/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162128/http:/fontm.com/hydrogen-whiskey-font/ "http://fontm.com/hydrogen-whiskey-font/")  
 [http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/data-seventy.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162128/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/data-seventy.aspx "http://www.ascenderfonts.com/font/data-seventy.aspx")
